Interface Codec<D,​E,​DX extends Throwable,​EX extends Throwable>

Type Parameters:
D - the decoded type
E - the encoded type
DX - the exception type
public interface Codec<D,​E,​DX extends Throwable,​EX extends Throwable>
A combination encoder and decoder.
